R

receivePacket(byte[]) - Method in class peripherals.Peripheral
Called from a lower layer when a packet is received.
refreshPlugins() - Static method in class peripherals.DescriptorFactory
Search for Plugins in the /plugins folder of the filesystem.
removeBlocks(ArrayList<TriggerLogicBlock>, ArrayList<LogicBlock>) - Static method in class Service
Removes a specified list of logic blocks from a Service by calling the removeFromService method in the LogicBlock class.
removeDevice(int) - Method in class automationNetwork.NetworkAdapter
Tells the network to remove a device.
removeFromService() - Method in class LogicBlock
Removes this LogicBlock from a service, decrementing numServices.
removeNextBlock(LogicBlock) - Method in class LogicBlock
Remove a specified LogicBlock from the list of next LogicBlock objects, nextBlocks.
removePeripheral(int) - Method in interface automationNetwork.Network
Instruct the network to stop communicating with the peripheral having ID peripheralID.
removePeripheral(int) - Method in class automationNetwork.ValerieNetwork
 
removePeripheral(String) - Method in class MainController
This method removes a Peripheral from the automation system.
removePrevBlock(LogicBlock) - Method in class LogicBlock
Remove a specified LogicBlock from the list of previous LogicBlock objects, prevBlocks.
removeService(String) - Method in class MainController
This method removes a Service from the automation system.
representation - Variable in class Service
A String representation of the logic of the Service that follows the following instructions.
